help-file.title: SCORE ATTRIBUTES
help-file.content:
"Score" is a command used to show the current state of your character. It will show you your level, race, class, current hit point/mana/movement ratios, the various types and amounts of currency you are carrying, your playing time, your title (if any), your group leader or who you are following, your followers (if any), your position, and the spells you are affected by (if any).
"Attributes" is a command used to show more information on your character. It shows your level, race, class, age, height, weight, strength, intelligence, wisdom, dexterity, constitution, armor class, hitroll, damroll, alignment, saving throws, player flags, wimpy level, and load carried.
